```{r}
geno <- read.table("rs8067378_ENSG00000172057.6.txt")
head(geno)
```


```{r}
table(geno$geno)
```


```{r}
inds <- geno$geno == "G/G"
summary(geno$exp[inds])
inds <- geno$geno == "A/G"
summary(geno$exp[inds])
inds <- geno$geno == "G/A"
summary(geno$exp[inds])
inds <- geno$geno == "A/A"
summary(geno$exp[inds])
```

```{r}
boxplot(exp~geno, geno)
```
